Bankimonline Privacy Policy

Bankimonline is committed to protecting your privacy and safeguarding your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

1. Information We Collect

1.1 Personal Information: We collect personal information that you provide to us voluntarily, such as full name, phone number, email address, date of birth, and ID number.

1.2 Financial Information: As part of mortgage or credit applications, we may collect information about your financial situation, including income, expenses, assets, and liabilities.

1.3 Technical Information: We automatically collect information about your use of the website, including IP address, browser type, operating system, and pages visited.

1.4 Cookies: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve website experience and for analytical purposes.

1.5 Information from External Sources: We may receive information about you from partner banks, credit reporting agencies, and other entities as part of credit risk assessment.

2. Use of Information

2.1 Service Purpose: We use your information to provide mortgage and credit comparison services, process your applications, and present suitable offers from partner banks.

2.2 Service Improvement: We use information to improve our website and services, develop new products, and conduct statistical research.

3. Information Sharing

3.1 Partner Banks: We may share your information with partner banks to obtain mortgage or credit offers, only after receiving your explicit consent.

3.2 Service Providers: We may share information with external service providers who assist us in operating the website and providing services.

4. Information Security

4.1 Encryption: We use advanced encryption technologies (SSL/TLS) to protect your information during transmission over the internet.

4.2 Limited Access: Access to your personal information is limited to authorized employees who need the information to perform their duties.

5. Your Rights

5.1 Right of Access: You have the right to request access to the personal information we hold about you.

5.2 Right of Correction: You have the right to request correction or updating of incorrect or inaccurate information.

5.3 Right of Deletion: You have the right to request deletion of your personal information, subject to legal limitations.

6. Contact Us

For any questions or requests related to our privacy policy, please contact us:

Phone: 03-5371622

Email: privacy@bankimonline.com | Data Protection Officer: dpo@bankimonline.com
